DOC.brief_summary: This explorative small pilot study compare two MRA contrast agent , one market year fairly new market . Since study explorative design provide preliminary information consideration future large study , sample size base statistical assumption .
DOC.brief_title: Renal MRA Crossover Study Comparing Multihance Another Contrast Agent
DOC.criteria: Known suspected renovascular disease base one follow criterion : severe hypertension hypertension refractory standard therapy abrupt onset moderate severe hypertension age < 35 year normalized blood pressure ACE inhibitor patient moderate severe hypertension unexplained stable elevation serum creatinine > 2Mg/dL positive finding stenosis another imaging modality
